question_name.english: What is the relationship between voltage (V), current (I), and resistance (R) according to Ohm's law?
question_name.hindi: ओम के नियम के अनुसार वोल्टेज (V), करंट (I), और प्रतिरोध (R) के बीच क्या संबंध है?

question_name.english: What is the SI unit of electrical resistance?
question_name.hindi: विद्युत प्रतिरोध की SI इकाई क्या है?

question_name.english: Which of these materials is an insulator?
question_name.hindi: इनमें से कौन सा पदार्थ कुचालक है?

question_name.english: What is the function of an electric switch?
question_name.hindi: विद्युत स्विच का क्या कार्य है?

english: To break or complete a circuit
hindi: सर्किट को तोड़ना या पूरा करना

question_name.english: What causes electric current to flow in a circuit?
question_name.hindi: सर्किट में विद्युत धारा का प्रवाह किस कारण होता है?

question_name.english: Which device measures electric current?
question_name.hindi: विद्युत धारा को कौन सा उपकरण मापता है?

question_name.english: What is the commercial unit of electrical energy?
question_name.hindi: विद्युत ऊर्जा की व्यावसायिक इकाई क्या है?

question_name.english: What is the effect of connecting resistors in series?
question_name.hindi: श्रेणीक्रम में प्रतिरोधकों को जोड़ने का क्या प्रभाव होता है?

question_name.english: Which of these affects the resistance of a conductor?
question_name.hindi: इनमें से कौन चालक के प्रतिरोध को प्रभावित करता है?

question_name.english: What is the purpose of an electric fuse in a circuit?
question_name.hindi: सर्किट में विद्युत फ्यूज का क्या उद्देश्य है?

hindi: अधिक करंट से बचाने के लिए

question_name.english: A circuit has three resistors of 6Ω each. If the power dissipated in one resistor is 36W, what is the voltage across each resistor in the parallel combination?
question_name.hindi: एक सर्किट में 6Ω के तीन प्रतिरोधक हैं। यदि एक प्रतिरोधक में व्ययित शक्ति 36W है, तो समानांतर संयोजन में प्रत्येक प्रतिरोधक के आर-पार वोल्टेज क्या है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='50' y1='30' x2='250' y2='30' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='40' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='70' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='100' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='30' x2='50' y2='120' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='50' x2='100' y2='50' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='80' x2='100' y2='80' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='110' x2='100' y2='110' stroke='black'/><line x1='140' y1='50' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='black'/><line x1='140' y1='80' x2='250' y2='80' stroke='black'/><line x1='140' y1='110' x2='250' y2='110' stroke='black'/><line x1='250' y1='30' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='black'/><text x='110' y='55'>6Ω</text><text x='110' y='85'>6Ω</text><text x='110' y='115'>6Ω</text></svg>

question_name.english: If a current of 2A flows through a resistance of 5Ω, what is the potential difference?
question_name.hindi: यदि 5Ω प्रतिरोध में 2A की धारा प्रवाहित होती है, तो विभवांतर क्या होगा?

question_name.english: Calculate the resistance of a conductor if current is 0.5A at 230V.
question_name.hindi: यदि 230V पर धारा 0.5A है, तो चालक का प्रतिरोध ज्ञात करें।

question_name.english: What is the power consumed by a device drawing 3A current at 12V?
question_name.hindi: 12V पर 3A धारा खींचने वाले उपकरण द्वारा खपत की गई शक्ति क्या है?

question_name.english: Two resistors of 6Ω and 3Ω are connected in series. Find the total resistance.
question_name.hindi: 6Ω और 3Ω के दो प्रतिरोधक श्रेणीक्रम में जुड़े हैं। कुल प्रतिरोध ज्ञात करें।

question_name.english: A 100W bulb operates at 250V. Calculate the current flowing through it.
question_name.hindi: एक 100W का बल्ब 250V पर कार्य करता है। इससे प्रवाहित धारा की गणना करें।

question_name.english: In the given circuit, if R₁ = 4Ω and R₂ = 6Ω are in parallel with 12V supply, calculate the total current drawn:
question_name.hindi: दिए गए सर्किट में, यदि R₁ = 4Ω और R₂ = 6Ω समानांतर में 12V आपूर्ति के साथ हैं, तो कुल धारा की गणना करें:

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='50' y1='30' x2='250' y2='30' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='50' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='90' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='30' x2='50' y2='120' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='60' x2='100' y2='60' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='100' x2='100' y2='100' stroke='black'/><line x1='140' y1='60' x2='250' y2='60' stroke='black'/><line x1='140' y1='100' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='black'/><line x1='250' y1='30' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='120' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='black'/><text x='110' y='65'>4Ω</text><text x='110' y='105'>6Ω</text><text x='30' y='70'>12V</text></svg>

question_name.english: A heating element draws 5A current at 220V. If the voltage drops to 110V, what will be the new power consumption assuming resistance remains constant?
question_name.hindi: एक हीटिंग एलिमेंट 220V पर 5A धारा खींचता है। यदि वोल्टेज घटकर 110V हो जाता है, तो प्रतिरोध स्थिर मानते हुए नई शक्ति खपत क्या होगी?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect x='120' y='60' width='60' height='30' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='125' y='80'>R</text><line x1='80' y1='75' x2='120' y2='75' stroke='black'/><line x1='180' y1='75' x2='220' y2='75' stroke='black'/><text x='90' y='60'>220V→110V</text><text x='190' y='60'>5A</text></svg>

question_name.english: In the given circuit, what will be the reading on the ammeter if the battery voltage is 9V and total resistance is 3Ω? (Consider internal resistance of ammeter as negligible)
question_name.hindi: दिए गए सर्किट में, यदि बैटरी वोल्टेज 9V और कुल प्रतिरोध 3Ω है, तो एमीटर का पाठ्यांक क्या होगा? (एमीटर का आंतरिक प्रतिरोध नगण्य मानें)

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='150' cy='60' r='15' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='145' y='65'>A</text><line x1='80' y1='60' x2='135' y2='60' stroke='black'/><line x1='165' y1='60' x2='220' y2='60' stroke='black'/><line x1='80' y1='40' x2='80' y2='80' stroke='black'/><line x1='90' y1='40' x2='90' y2='80' stroke='black'/><text x='60' y='65'>9V</text><rect x='180' y='50' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='190' y='65'>3Ω</text></svg>

question_name.hindi: दिए गए सर्किट का विश्लेषण करें और बिंदु A और B के बीच तुल्य प्रतिरोध निर्धारित करें:

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='50' y1='50' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='40' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='80' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='180' y='60' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='50' x2='50' y2='100' stroke='black'/><line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='100' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='black'/><text x='110' y='55'>6Ω</text><text x='110' y='95'>6Ω</text><text x='190' y='75'>12Ω</text><text x='40' y='45'>A</text><text x='260' y='45'>B</text></svg>
